definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to carve/carved words/to agree/a contract/a deed
wedge/peg/stopper/prologue (in some modern novels)/prologue or interlude in Yuan dynasty drama
(bird species of China) Cachar wedge-billed babbler (Sphenocichla roberti)
(bird species of China) Chinese grey shrike (Lanius sphenocercus)
(bird species of China) wedge-tailed green pigeon (Treron sphenurus)
(bird species of China) Ross's gull (Rhodostethia rosea)

sentences.english: But Fate does iron wedges drive.
The sensor consists of two sets of quartz wedges which are respectively right-handed and left-handed with equal angle.
sentences.chinese: 传感元件为两套楔角相同的左旋和右旋石英光楔。

sentences.english: The shifting range ofthe saline wedge basically tallies with the length of the mouth bar.
sentences.chinese: 盐水楔上下游运动的范围与拦门沙的长度基本上吻合。

sentences.english: The article has introduced the cross wedge rolling preforming technology and its die design.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了楔横轧制坯工艺及其模具设计。

sentences.english: A saltwater wedge may be found when the sea water encroaches on the estuary during the plentiful runoff and spring tide.
sentences.chinese: 闽江河口丰水大潮期盐水入侵过程中可见到盐水楔。

sentences.english: Take the adequate distance between the furnace wall and the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 坩埚与炉壁之间应保持适当间隔，且用楔牢牢固定。

sentences.english: The following conclusions are gained:1. The main reason of ChangJi anticline form is the wedging of triangle zone.
sentences.chinese: 昌吉背斜是因为三角构造楔的楔入而生成的褶皱背斜。

sentences.english: The angle of refraction at total optical reflection is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 当折射棱镜折射角很小时，称之为光楔。

sentences.english: The latter is the "water wedging" action induced by entering of water into the crack.
sentences.chinese: 后者是库水进入裂缝后形成的足够强的“水楔”作用。

sentences.english: It is called the optical wedge, when the refraction angle of the refracting prisms is tiny.
sentences.chinese: 当折射棱镜折射角很小时，称之为光楔。

sentences.english: In addition, this paper studies the distribution of wedge looseness.
sentences.chinese: 研究了松动槽楔在电机定子中的分布。

definition: vertical divider of a door way
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon)
chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]
to cut/to carve/to engrave/to chisel/fig. to chisel away at
